data.title: Breeze-Thru
data.subtitle: Design/Development
data.description: Cricket Wireless wanted a way to allow new customers to activate there service on any phone. Using an agile process I lead a team to build an web application to do this. While designing and developing the app there was a strong need to make sure the app was accessible to the color blind, visually impaired and etc. We had an internal focus group to test the app and enhance areas where negative comments where given. Once the app launched it became successful. Because of the success, my hard work and help from my team I was able to get the The AT&T Service Excellence Award.

images.alt: Breeze-Thru add IMEI and ICCID data

data.title: aio to Cricket Wireless
data.subtitle: Development
data.description: When rebranding the website from aio to Cricket we had to change sections of the site per release. Because of this we had to figure out certain issues like insuring new pages were responsive while the older pages stayed as a fixed width. It took about a year to completely re-brand the site.

data.title: Company Development
data.subtitle: Design/Development
data.description: Around 2013, a couple of developers and I created a SaaS application for land surveying, engineering, and geospatial services firms. I was tasked to design all the elements for the application then work on any development work.

images.alt: Rove Logix Client App Permission Settings

data.title: Caterpillar Inc. News App
data.subtitle: Design/Development
data.description: I created the UI design and some minor development work for this iPhone and Android App. This app was packed with a CAT stock price, latest news from CAT, videos, pdfs and more.

data.title: 2013 Clorox Annual Report
data.subtitle: Development
data.description: A major feature Clorox wanted for this website was being responsive so I developed it using the Zurb Foundation Framework to create an excellent fluid feel that will look good on any screen. Having creative freedom on the mobile layouts I made sure the navigation and content was easy to use and read.

images.alt: 2013 Clorox Annual Report About Report page
2013 Clorox Annual Report tablet and mobile versions

data.title: 2012 Darden Annual Report
data.subtitle: Design/Development
data.description: With the designers swamped with work I was given the task to design the 2012 Darden annual report website. While I mostly did the design I was able to help out of the development a little bit.

images.alt: 2012 Darden Annual Report Built to Deliver
2012 Darden Annual Report Built to Deliver 2

data.title: Weather App
data.subtitle: Design/Development
data.description: Using React I designed and developed a small weather app. The app will allow the user to add or remove weather widgets. To ensure the user can come back to the app with the data still there each widget is saved in the local storage. Click here to see the app.

data.title: Crunchy Roll Website Concept
data.subtitle: Design
data.description: This is a redesign concept I did for Crunchy Roll. The purpose was to update the design to a cleaner look and not feel dated.

data.title: Instagram App Concept
data.subtitle: Design
data.description: After the release of Instagram on iOS 7 I decided to tweak the design a little bit to separate certain elements of the app a little better.
